Sets the portal password settings.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"minLength":{"type":"integer","description":"The minimum number of characters required for valid passwords.","format":"int32","example":1234},"upperCase":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the password should contain the uppercase letters or not.","example":true},"digits":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the password should contain the digits or not.","example":true},"specSymbols":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the password should contain the special symbols or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring the password complexity requirements.","title":"PasswordSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
